column4: Is there a non-Google-branded  version of Chromium for ubuntu?
chromium shouldn't be google "branded", it might be the defaults for most stuff (but that should be changable)
I get many prompts to log in to Google, which I have no intention of doing, and the extensions page points me to the google "store".
if you won't like google, don't support them by using chromium... or worse chrome.
